duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and implement policies and procedures related to quality improvement and safety initiatives.
Support the Clinical Affairs team in managing projects for quality and safety and operational initiatives.
Analyze and synthesize large amounts of data for preparing sound proposals and analyses.
Communicate and collaborate with various stakeholders to manage multiple projects with demanding timeframes.
Conduct research, analysis, and development of solutions to complex issues.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in a related area and / or equivalent experience / training (Master's preferred)
